parentProduct.title: Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Implementation Guide for Human Clinical Trials Version 2.0
Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Implementation Guide for Human Clinical Trials Version 2.0

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor element for scenario field SR.DenormalizedExample.FLARESZ_SRORRES

sdtmigDatasetMappingTargets.title: Skin Response Test or Exam Short Name
Results or Findings in Original Units
Skin Response Test or Examination Name

fields.definition: The size of the area of redness that forms around the site of an antigenic challenge to the skin.
fields.implementationNotes: Each test may be collected using the CDASH variable [TESTCD] (e.g., FLARESZ) or [TESTCD]_SRORRES where TESTCD is the appropriate CT for the SR test code e.g., FLARESZ_SRORRES.
fields.label: Flare Size
fields.mappingInstructions: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable listed in the column with the heading "SDTMIG Target". In addition to the SDTMIG variable SRORRES, create the SDTMIG variable SRTESTCD from the CDASH variable name and determine the value of SRTEST from SRTESTCD. The CDASH prompt may also contain the SRTEST. Use appropriate CDISC Controlled Terminology for the test and test code.
fields.name: FLARESZ_SRORRES
fields.questionText: What was the result of the flare size measurement?

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Implementation Guide for Human Clinical Trials Version 2.0

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor element for scenario field SR.DenormalizedExample.FLARESZ_SRORRESU

sdtmigDatasetMappingTargets.title: Original Units

fields.completionInstructions: Record or select the original units in which these data were collected, if not pre-printed on CRF.
fields.definition: The unit of measure for the size of the area of redness that forms around the site of an antigenic challenge to the skin.
fields.implementationNotes: Should be pre-printed on the CRF with the associated test when possible, rather than collected in a field that requires the site to enter text.
fields.label: Flare Size Unit
fields.mappingInstructions: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable listed in the column with the heading "SDTMIG Target".
fields.name: FLARESZ_SRORRESU
fields.questionText: What was the unit of the flare size measurement?

sdtmigDatasetMappingTargets.title: Skin Response Test or Examination Name
Skin Response Test or Exam Short Name
Results or Findings in Original Units

fields.definition: A semi-quantitative size assessment of the flat, circular, slightly raised area that forms around the site of an antigenic challenge to the skin.
fields.implementationNotes: Each test may be collected using the CDASH variable [TESTCD] ( e.g., WHEALSZ) or [TESTCD]_SRORRES where TESTCD is the appropriate CT for the SR test code e.g., WHEALSZ_SRORRES.
fields.label: Wheal Size
fields.mappingInstructions: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable listed in the column with the heading "SDTMIG Target". In addition to the SDTMIG variable SRORRES, create the SDTMIG variable SRTESTCD from the CDASH variable name and determine the value of SRTEST from SRTESTCD. The CDASH prompt may also contain the SRTEST. Use appropriate CDISC Controlled Terminology for the test and test code.
fields.name: WHEALSZ_SRORRES
fields.questionText: What was the result of the wheal size measurement?
